HomePagePart1: This application will help you to memorize and do not skip important events which you perform periodically.
HomePagePart2: You see only the days and events you have. All the information is displayed in one list.
You don't have to search the calendar to find your next event.
TasksListEmpty: Schedule your activities. It is easy to create a first task. You need to make up a name and
set the recurrence time (once, daily, monthly, etc).
